content.rendered:
“Developers, Developers, Developers”

EHRbase aims to build a vivid developers community. EHRbase developers are people that actively work on the source code, on a regular basis as part of the core team or by providing occassional contributions. As of now, Vitasystems and Peter L. Reichertz Institute for Medical Infomatics (Hannover Medical School) are the main contributors to EHRbase. Both organizatons work jointly on EHRbase as part of HiGHmed. The core team follows a classic scrum project management approach with sprint cycles lasting for two weeks. EHRbase is open to welcome new partners and contributors.

What will you find here?

The information you will find here is related to the ongoing development of EHRbase. You also find ways how to get into contact with the developers.
